price: 35. Waxaanse u diri hadiyad oo sugi waxay (jawaab) la soo noqdaan ergaydu.
arabic: وَإِنِّي مُرۡسِلَةٌ إِلَيۡهِم بِهَدِيَّةٖ فَنَاظِرَةُۢ بِمَ يَرۡجِعُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī mur'silatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarjiʿu al-mur'salūna
